mapper.select: select split_goods_detail_id, split_goods_id, plan_detail_id, allot_amount, remain_amount, freight_price, freight_total, detail_remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_time, is_deleted, company_id from t_split_goods_detail where split_goods_id = #{splitGoodsId} and company_id = #{companyId} and is_deleted = #{isDeleted}

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_split_goods_detail (split_goods_id, plan_detail_id, allot_amount, remain_amount, freight_price, freight_total, detail_remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_time, is_deleted, company_id ) values (#{splitGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{planDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{allotAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{remainAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{freightPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{freightTotal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{detailRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: update t_split_goods_detail set split_goods_id = #{splitGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, plan_detail_id = #{planDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, allot_amount = #{allotAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, remain_amount = #{remainAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, freight_price = #{freightPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, freight_total = #{freightTotal,jdbcType=REAL}, detail_remark = #{detailRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where split_goods_detail_id = #{splitGoodsDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
